'jug pa/ sdig pa la gzhol ba/ bud med kyi thul 'og tu chud pa/ bud med kyis 'khol ba/ bud med kyi dbang du song ba/ bud med la gzhol ba/ bud med dang gnas pa/
rma'i sgo'i spyod yul can/ rma'i sgo la rten pa/ rma'i sgo la gnas pa kha chu dang / snabs dang / mchil ma dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang / she'u rul dang /
klad rgyas dang / mi gtsang ba'i spyod yul can/ lug dang / ba glang dang / bya gag dang / khyi dang / phag dang / wa dang / bong bu'i chos spyod pa/ gnod pas 'tsho ba/ pha ma
la phangs par mi 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sbyin gnas la phangs par mi 'dzin pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dad pa yongs su nyams pa/ mya ngan las
'da' ba las yongs su nyams pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten la zhugs shing gzhol ba/ seng ge dang / nam mkha' lding gi
lus la yang dag par zhugs pa/ lcags kyi shing shal ma li mthon po dang / me ma mur la gzhol ba/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms
dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por zhugs pa ni bud med kyi skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag thos
nas kyang / bud med la chags shing bud med dang bsten pas/ bgad pa dang / ngu ba dang / ca co 'don pa dang / bro brdungs pa dang / glu blangs pa dang / rol mo byas pa dag rjes su
dran par byed cing / skyo pa mi bskyed/ yid byung bar mi byed de/ rgyal po chen po/ byis pa'i chos la kun tu spyod cing / kun tu spyod pa de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes pa ni ngan song rnams su skye bar
'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po/ bud med kyi dbang du song nas 'dod pa la sten cing / ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni/ skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon dang po yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'dod pa dri nga mi gtsang smad par 'os pa dang / /mi mthun 'jigs byed mi rtag las byung sdug bsngal byed/ /don med phung bar
byed cing dman pa yin pas na/ /mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i skom la rten par byed/ /btsog pas gang ba'i chab khung dri nga lta bu dang / /mnam par gyur cing rul ba'i khyim rnams ji
bzhin dang / /shi ba dur khrod sa na shin tu smad pa ltar/ /de bzhin 'dod pa rnams kyang mchog tu smad pa yin/ /sbrang bu rma zhig mthong nas rgyug pa ci 'dra dang / /phag ni ngan skyugs
mthong nas rgyug pa ci 'dra dang / /khyi ni sha yi don du shen sar 'gro ba ltar/ /de bzhin mi mkhas bud med dag la dga' bar byed/ /grags pa med cing mi snyan yon tan 'dri ba
dang / /de las tshul khrims mtho la nyams par gyur pa dang / /mtho ris nyams shing dmyal ba dag tu ltung bas na/ /mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i skom la rten par byed/ /ji ltar
ha la ha la'i dug ni zos pa na/ /lus ngag rmya zhing rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur ba ltar/ /de bzhin 'di na byis pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i rgyus/ /rang gi lus kyi
dbyibs ni dug tu mi rig go /ji ltar sgyu ma shin tu bslabs pa'i mi zhig gis/ /rnam par 'phrul bas sems can brgya dag dga' byed ltar/ /de bzhin byis pa bdag la bde bar
'dod pa rnams/ /'dod pa dga' ba'i rgyu las ngan 'gror rab tu ltung / /zas skom ston mo bzang po tha dad pa dag dang / /glu bro sil snyan bzang po tha dad pa dag gis/ /khang pa
mchog nas byung ba'i chung ma len pa ni/ /gnod pa rnyed pa yin zhing sdug bsngal gsog pa yin/ /'dod pa'i dga' la brkam pa dag ni gnod yin te/ /mi gtsang mchog 'dra
rmongs gyur dag la bsngags pa brjod/ /'dod pa dman pa dag la bsngags shing bsten nas ni/ /dman pa de dag ngan 'gror rab tu ltung bar 'gyur/ /gnod pa 'dod pa
dag gis yul rnams rab bsngags shing / /'dod pa gnod pa yin la dga' ba'i byis pa rnams/ /de dag don med 'tsho ba rnam par spangs nas ni/ /mi bzad g.yang sa chen por
rab tu ltung bar 'gyur/ /nga rgyal rmongs pas bcom pa'i skye dgu 'di dag ni/ /rgya mtsho'i pha rol ma mthong ba yi bya bzhin du/ /lcags kyi me lce lnga po dag la chags gyur na/ /byis
pa rnams ni rab tu 'bar zhing 'khyam par 'gyur/ /'di na byis pa myos shing shin tu rmongs pa rnams/ /shin tu mi mthong snod mchog yin par sems pa ltar/ /lam la rnam par rmongs
rnams 'dod pa'i ched kyi phyir/ /rtag tu 'dir gnas 'di ni gya nom yin zhes 'dzer/ /gang phyir rnam pa sna tshogs las dag mi shes pas/ /'gro ba thams cad rab nyams gud pa
yod min pas/ /pha dang ma dang bu dang bu mo dag la ni/ /don gyis mchod pa mi byed gnod pa thob pa yin/ /de dag rtag tu bud med 'dris pa rjod byed cing / /de 'dra'i las kyi tshul la rab
tu 'jug par byed/ /de dag gti mug dra ba sdig pa rab gsog cing / /ngan song 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i lam yang gsog par byed/ /mi rnams de dag der chags bde bar 'du shes
shing / /pha dang ma yang yongs su rab tu spong bar byed/ /de dag mchod 'os rnams la mchod par mi byed cing / /smad par 'os pa'i 'dod pa dag ni tshol bar byed/ /phan tshun gdung bar
'gyur ba la ni gzhol byed cing / /rnam rtog mu yis nges bcom mi rnams nyon mongs pa/ /bkur sti yongs su tshol la dga' zhing ma 'phags rnams/ /chos ma yin par 'jig rten
rab tu 'dzud par byed/ /gzhi de las ni mtshon cha dag dang lcags rnams dang / /de bzhin 'ching ba dang ni 'thab cing rtsod pa dang / /nges par 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu myong ba
'gyur/ /shi 'phos nas ni mnar med 'jigs su rung bar 'gro/ /tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin sdug bsngal 'byung 'gyur zhing / /nor nyams snying du sdug pa rab tu
'jig 'gyur la/ /mtho ris nyams zhing dmyal bar rab tu ltung bas na/ /mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed/ /lcags las grub pa'i nags tshal sngon po'i
khrod dag tu/ /mkhas pas bdag nyid khrod du bor ba de blang zhing / /mdzangs pa spu gri'i so yis bcad pa byas sla la/ /ral gri dag gi khrod du mal yang bcas sla zhing / /rab tu
me 'bar thu lum bzung ba de sla la/ /de bzhin lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba za sla zhing / /me dong 'jigs su rung ba rnams la reg sla yi/ /lag pa gnyis ni nam yang bud med
reg mi bya/ /mis ni ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa rnams bsten pa/ /de lta de ltar bde ba thams cad rab spong zhing / /'di ltar 'dod rnams gcig tu sdug bsngal mi gtsang bas/ /
'dod pa sdug bsngal mi gtsang ba dag rnam par spongs/ /'dod pa sdug bsngal kun gyi gzhi bor gyur pa dang / /gang phyir nor ni chud zar 'gyur bar byed pa dang / /yid 'ong
skye bo rnams kyi nyams pa'i rtsa ba bas/ /bud med nges par bsten pa gnod pa thob pa yin/ /skyes pa gang gis de 'dra'i chos tshul rig nas ni/ /bud med rnams la rab tu bag med mi
'gyur ba/ /des ni rtag tu mtho ris lam yang rnam sbyangs shing / /des ni byang chub dam pa rnyed par dka' ma yin/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang mi'i pha ma dag ni dka' ba byed pa dag
yin te/ zla ba dgu'am/ zla ba bcur mngal na bzung ste/ shin tu sdug bsngal bar g.yo zhing / gcin dang / phyis yang 'phyi bar byed/ pang du blangs nas nu zho ldud par byed/ phung po
rnams skyed par byed/ khams rnams gso bar byed/ 'jig rten ston par byed/ 'dzam bu'i gling sna tshogs ston par byed/ don du 'dod/ phan par 'dod/ grub pa dang / bde bar
'dod/ 'jig rten la yang phan par 'dod pa ste/ sbyin pa'i gnas yin la/ bu la phan pa dang / bde bar 'dod pas/ de dag gis rang gi nor gyi tshogs kyis gzhan gyi khyim nas
gzhan gyi bu mo blangs pa dang / de de la chags shing myos la 'chums shing brgyal ba dang / lhag par zhen pa dang / lhag par zhen cing 'dug par gyur nas/ gzhan gyi khyim nas
blangs pa'i bud med de la chags shing myos pas sbyin pa'i gnas pha ma dag rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs la/ lus nyam chung zhing mig gis mi mthong ba dag brnyas shing longs
spyod med pa dang / nor med par byas nas/ rang gi khyim nas phyung ste/ skrod par byed do/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di ltar pha ma dka' ba byed byed pa sbyin pa'i gnas la/ rtag tu rgyun mi
'chad par yang dag pa'i bde bas bsti stang du bya/ bla mar bya/ brjed par bya/ mchod par bya ba'i rigs na/ des de'i tshe pha ma dag rang gi khyim nas phyung /
bskrad nas gzhan gyi khyim nas blangs pa'i bud med la/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing bsti stang du byed/ gces su byed/ rim gro byed la
mchod pa byed cing / yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byed kyi/ pha ma la ni mi byed pa'i snying brtse ba med pa dang / mi lta ba dang / ngan pa'i sems dang ldan pa la ltos/ rgyal po
chen po/ des bde 'gror 'gro ba'i chos gang yin pa de ni spangs la/ ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos gang yin pa de ni yang dag par blangs te 'dug pa'i mi de la yang ltos/ rgyal po
chen po/ bud med kyi dbang du song nas/ 'dod pa rnams la sten cing / pha ma la brnyas pa dang / ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni/ skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon gnyis pa yin
no| |de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/ /de dag rtag tu bde zhing yid kyang bder
'gyur la/ /'di la lha dang bcas pa dang ni dbang po dang / /de bzhin 'di la tshangs par bcas pa'i rigs su 'gyur/ gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/ /de dag
song nas phyir 'ong ba yang 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /rgya mtsho chen po nas kyang bde zhing legs 'ong ste/ /de ltar byed pa dag ni rab mchog rnyed pa yin/ /gang dag pa ma rgas pa gso bar
byed pa yi/ /tshong dpon de dag yon tan kun gyi gtsor 'gyur zhing / /de bzhin zhing las 'bras bu phun sum tshogs 'byung ste/ /bsod nams bgrang ba'i don du brjod par mi nus
so| |gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/ /de dag khur rnams khyer ba'i rnga mo rnams dang yang / /yang na glang dang bong bu rtag tu mi 'gyur te/ /mi rnams de dag spu gri'i
so la rdzi mi 'gyur/ /gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/ /de dag chu bo rab med dang ni me mur dang / /spu gri'i so dang ldan pa la yang mi rgal te/ /de dag zangs khu bskol
ba 'thung ba yong mi 'gyur/ /gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/ /de dag nor dang 'bru ni mi nyung mang ba dang / /chung ma bu dang bu mo dam pa dag dang yang / /bai DUR+Ya dang
rin chen sa le sbram yang rnyed/ /gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/ /de dag rab 'phrul lha yi pho brang dag dang ni/ /rtsub 'gyur dang ni 'dres pa'i tshal yang mthong
'gyur te/ /lha rnams du mas rtag tu mdun du bdar bar 'gyur/ /mi yi gtso bor gyur cing lha yi lhar gyur pa/ /thub pa chen po 'di 'dra'i gsung ni thos gyur na/ /rgas shing
dbang po shin tu nyam chung gyur pa yi/ /pha ma sbyin gnas dam pa su zhig gso mi byed/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang skyes bu dam pa ma yin na/ skyes bu
dam pa ma yin pa'i las byed cing / log par blta ba la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba gang yin zhes bdag gi don mi shes shing / mi brtan
pa yin pas skye bo mang po rnams mi dga' zhing / byis pa'i skye bos bsngags pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gis rmongs par gyur pa dang /
skyes bu mdzangs pa dag gis smad pa dang / khro bas zil gyis non cing / sdig pa'i las byed pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su spangs
pa dang / longs spyod kyi rgyags pas myos pa dang / ser sna can du gyur pa dang / gzhan la gnod par mngon par dga' zhing / chos goms pas mi dga' ba yin te/ rgyal po chen
po| skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa/ skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i las la mngon par dga' zhing / skyes bu dam pa'i las la mi dga' ba de la ltos/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'dod
pa rnams la sten cing ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni/ skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon gsum pa yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag skyes
bka' stsal to/ /'dod pa rnams kyi gzhis ni skyes bu rnams nyams shing / /gzhi de las ni sdig pa dag kyang rab tu byed/ /log par lta bas rmongs nas 'dir ni 'khyam 'gyur zhing / /
de ni rnam par 'khrul pas ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ /log dang ldan pas yon tan kun gyis rnam spangs shing / /de ni rtog pa med cing blo yang nor ba yin/ /gang dag chu klung dag
tu ut+pal rtswa tshol ltar/ /log par lta bas yongs su 'khor bar byed pa yin/ /bde ba'i don du bdag nyid yongs su skyong byed cing / /chos ma yin la chags pa'i mi rnams mang
po dag/ de bzhin bde ba'i rgyu phyir 'dod pa rnams tshol ba/ /de dag gti mug rmongs pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ gang dag 'dod pa rnams kyi don du rtag tu ni/ /de
bzhin sems la gcags pa'i skyes bu tha ma dang / /'dod pa'i bdag nyid can dang skye bo sdig can dang / /'du shes log pa dag la bde ba ga la yod/ /mi rnams de dag
byas pa mi gzo sdig bcas shing / /dad pa rnam nyams tshul 'chos gus pa med pa dang / /'phags pa'i tshogs kyis rtag tu rnam par spangs pas na/ /dmyal ba bzod brlag
shin tu 'jigs su rung ba dang / /gzugs dang sgra dang ro la chags pa'i mi rnams ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang mkhas pa mi mchod cing / /log par lta bas
chos kyang nyan par mi byed la/ /lan 'ga' 'ang dge 'dun legs par mchod par mi byed pas/ /'phags pa rnams kyis rnam spangs ngan song ltung
bas na/ /de phyir mi yi srid pa 'di ni rnyed pa la/ /sbyin dul yang dag sdom la nges par sten cig dang / /de las byang chub dam pa mchog kyang thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal po chen po/
gzhan yang skyes bu ni bzo'i gnas sna tshogs dang / las kyi mtha' sna tshogs dag gis 'tsho bar byed de/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di ltar yi ge'am/ rtsis sam/ grangs sam/
lag rtsis sam/ mtshon cha'am/ rgyal po la zho shas 'tsho ba'am/ zhing las sam/ tshong byed pa'am/ ba lang 'tsho ba'am/ de lta bu'i bzo'i gnas sna tshogs dang /
las kyi gnas sna tshogs dag gis 'tsho bar byed cing / 'di lta ste/ nor gyi phyir lam ma yin par yang 'gro bar byed/ lam ngan par yang 'gro bar byed/ gcong rong
dang chu klung can gyi lam du yang 'gro bar byed/ mtshon cha'i lam du yang 'gro bar byed/ rgya mtshor 'jug par yang 'jug par byed/ grang ba'i dus na yang lhags
pas gnod par byed/ dro ba'i dus na yang tsha bas gnod par byed cing / bkres pa dang skom pa dag gis gnod bzhin du 'gro ba la yang spro bar byed de/ longs spyod
yongs su tshol ba na/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal dag gis longs spyod yongs su btsal nas kyang / rang gi 'tsho ba dag gi phyir nye bar sgrub par byed pas/ dge sbyong dang / bram
ze dag dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / slong mo ba dag la sbyin pa sbyin par mi bzod cing / bud med rnams kyi dbang du byas pa dang / bud med rnams kyi
thul 'og tu chud pa dang / bud med rnams kyis bkol ba dang / bud med rnams la byams pa de nyid kyis bud med de dag nyid gso ba'i phyir sbyin pa byin pa dang / tshul khrims
yang dag par len par mi nus shing / de de la chags la bud med kyis spyos pa bzod par byed cing / bud med kyis bsdigs pa dang / bltas pa dang / brgyabs pa dag kyang
bzod par byed de/ de skyes par gyur kyang bud med kyis bsdigs pa dang du len cing / mi dgar med par de'i ngor lta bar byed pa ni/ 'dod pa'i gzhis bud med kyi dbang du song
ba yin te/ rgyal po chen po/ bud med la bsten cing / ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni/ skyes pa bud med la bskam zhing ngan skyugs kyi sgo la 'du ba dang / mi gtsang ba la dga'
ba dang / shes bzhin med par spyod pa'i skyes bu'i skyon bzhi pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po/ skyon de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes pa ni 'dod pa rnams kyi dbang du 'gro ba yin no/ /de nas
de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'dod pa rnams ni tshol ba na/ /rab tu myos pa ga la bde/ /'dod pa dman pa rnams
bsten pa/ /de ni gang gis bde bar 'gyur/ /skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i/ /las rnams byed cing mi sdom la/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags tshol byed pa/ /de dag rab nyams chud kyang za/ /mi
rnams gang dag mi mkhas pa/ /rnga mo bong bu'i chos spyod cing / /bud med mthong na rab snyegs pa/ /ngan skyugs gnas la phag rnams bzhin/ /gang la byis pa gus bcas pa'i/ /'dod
rnams dring mi gtsang yang / /'dod pa'i skyon rnams mi mthong ba/ /sa yi steng na dmus long bzhin/ /gzugs kyi 'ching bas bcings pa rnams/ /'dod pa'i 'du shes rab tu 'jug/
byis pa 'dod rnams bsten pa dag/ khyi dang wa rnams ji bzhin no/ /sgra dri ro dang reg rnams kyis/ /gang la so so'i skye bo rnams/ /byis pa 'khor bar yongs 'khor bya/ /spre'u rnams
phur la btags pa bzhin/ /byis pa ma rig khebs pa rnams/ /mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs gyur cing / /bud med rnams la chags pa ni/ /mi gtsang gnas pa khwa bzhin no/ /
gang gis ngan 'gror rab 'jug pa/ /de ni bdud kyi spyod yul yin/ /ro myang 'du shes chags gyur pa/ /ngan skyugs gnas la srin bu bzhin/ /gsad pa'i gshed ma rnams
kyis ni/ /ji ltar mi zhig bor ba ltar/ /shes nas thar pa thob 'gyur zhing / /bud med dbang du 'gro mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa bud med lta byed pa'i/ /kun tu sbyor la 'jigs pa skye/ /byis pa mtshan
mar 'dzin pa rnams/ /'dod pa'i srid pa rab tu 'phel/ /so ga'i dus na mi zhig ni/ /dgon pa chen por song gyur nas/ /byis pas lan tshwa'i chu 'thungs na/ /skom pa phyir zhing rab spyod ltar/ /de
bzhin bden pa ma mthong ba'i/ /byis pa rmongs pas 'tsho ba rnams/ /'di na phyir zhing bud med la/ /'dod pa'i sred pa brtan par 'gyur/ /ji ltar mi lus mdze can la/ /srog chags rnams
ni za ba ltar/ /'dod brkam so so'i skye bo rnams/ /de bzhin bud med rnams kyis zos/ /mi gtsang bum pa khra bo zhig/ kha dog ldan par snang mos kyi/ /nang na ha la ha la'i dug/ drag po chen po yod
pa ltar/ /de bzhin bud med brgyan pa dag/ gang dang gang na snang ba yang / /gcin dang phyi sas gang ba yi/ /rkyal pa rlung gis bkang ba bzhin/ /'bru mar gyis ni bdar ba'i mtshon/ /gos kyis dkris

ba ji bzhin du/ /de bzhin bud med brgyan pa yang / /ral gri rling ba g.yogs pa bzhin/ /ji ltar me dong gang gyur la/ /du ba med cing 'bar ldan ltar/ /bud med de bzhin me 'dra zhing / /srin bu gtum po bzhin

du g.yo/ /sreg pa'i bskal pa 'dir byung na/ /sa ni kun tu 'bar gyur la/ /rtswa dang gel pa 'jig 'gyur zhing / /chu klung dag kyang bskam par 'gyur/ /'byung ba chen po'i gnas gyur pa/ /rgya mtsho yang ni bskam 'gyur
zhing / /ri bo chen po rnam bsreg la/ /de bzhin lhun po'ang 'jig par 'gyur/ /rgyal chen 'byung po 'dzin pa yin/ /sa 'di'ang rnam par 'jig 'gyur zhing //
brag chen rnams ni 'jig 'gyur la/ /skyob par byed pa yod ma yin/ /ji ltar me yis rir bcas dang / /rgya mtshor bcas pa bsreg pa ltar/ /de bzhin bud med me 'dra ste/ /gtum
zhing skyes bu g.yo bar byed/ /snabs dang mchil ma kha chu dang / /klad rgyas rus pa'i klad pa dang / /lus la dri nga 'dzag de la/ /byis pa rnams ni sbrang rtsi bzhin/ /kha sgo rus pas gang
ba dang / /sha dang pags la sogs bsags shing / /de bzhin lus ni 'bras 'dra ste/ /dri nga smad par bya ba yin/ /mi gtsang sna tshogs gang ba dang / /'bras ni smin par gyur
pa ltar/ /de ltar lus 'di mi gtsang ba/ /sna tshogs rnams kyi snod yin no/ /lto ni mnye ma mcher ba dang / /glo bas gang zhing mkhal ma dang / /khrag dang mkhris pas gang gyur la/ /klad
rgyas kyis ni klad pa gang / /khong pa'i nang na srin bu'i rigs/ /brgyad khri po dag gnas gyur kyang / /gti mug drwa bas bsgribs pa yi/ /byis pa rnams kyis mi mthong ngo / /rma sgo dgu
nas rtag tu ni/ /mi gtsang rul pa zag gyur kyang / /smra ba dag dang lta ba la/ /byis pa rnams ni mtshan mar 'dzin/ /gang zhig kun gyis smad pa'i yul/ /chags pa rnams kyis phyis
mi shes/ /mi gtsang spyod yul byis pa rnams/ /snabs dang mchil ma za bar byed/ /smad par 'os la chags byed pa/ /sbrang bu rnams kyis rma mthong bzhin/ /mchan khung dag nas rdul
'dzag cing / /smad pa'i dri ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /byis pa sdug bsngal chags byed pa/ /de dag bdag la gnod phyir g.yo/ /des ni myur du phongs gyur te/ /nya rnams chu nas bton
pa bzhin/ /'jigs rung lag na mtshon thogs kyis/ /ji ltar mi zhig gtses pa ltar/ /mtshon 'dra'i bud med sdig can gyis/ /'dod la chags rnams de bzhin no/ /rnam rgyal lag
na mtshon thogs pas/ /ji ltar rgyal po gtses pa ltar/ /'dod chags me dang 'dra ba yis/ /'dod la chags rnams de bzhin bsreg/ shen pa'i gnas la khyi rnams ltar/ /myang bar
'du shes byis pa rnams/ /ji ltar dgra yis skrag pa ltar/ /myur du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/ /rang gi las kyi nyes pa yis/ /de la skyob pa med pa ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gi
nyes pa yis/ /sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro/ de dag sangs rgyas chos spangs nas/ /bud med rnams kyi rnag la brten/ sems ni ro la chags gyur pa/ /de yis ngan 'gror
'gro bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar spre'u zhig shing las ni/ /shing gzhan du ni gyur pa'i tshe/ /de ni gnas der gtses gyur na/ /de nyid du ni sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'dod la brkam
pa dang / /sdug bsngal 'dod chags bstan pa dang / /gti mug rgyal thogs pa rnams/ /dus ni yang dang yang du 'da'/ /mi bkren rnams ni gsal
shing la/ /rab tu btsugs nas 'phyang ba ltar/ /de bzhin 'dod la chags pa rnams/ /shal ma li yi mtho la 'phyang / /ji ltar mon sran sde'u dang gre'u/ /lcags zangs rnams su
blugs byas nas/ /mes ni rab tu bsregs pa na/ /lbu bar bcas shing khol ba ltar/ /de bzhin dge ba ma mthong zhing / /'dod la chags pa'i skye bo rnams/ /shi nas ngan song
'gro 'gyur zhing / /lcags zangs rnams su btso bar 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa'i/ /sems can sdig pa rnams kyi gnas/ /zangs ni bye ba drug cu dang / /gzhan
yang bzhi po dag yin no/ /zangs ni so so re re la/ /tshad ni dmigs su yod min zhing / /me yi phung por ldan rnams su/ /bskal pa du mar btso bar 'gyur/ /kha cig zangs
rnams de dag tu/ /rang gi las kyi bskal brgya'am/ /nyis brgya sum brgya tshang bar 'tshod/ /yang na bzhi brgyar btso bar 'gyur/ /sra skam rnon po rnams kyis ni/ /bzung zhing
yang dang yang smyugs pas/ /de dag sha ni yod min zhing / /dung ltar dkar ba rnams su 'gyur/ /lcags kyi gzhong par 'dug nas ni/ /rab tu tsha zhing 'dren pa med/ /shi zhing shi
zhing skye 'gyur te/ /rang gi las kyis gnas par 'gyur/ /gang tshe dmyal ba'i srung rnams kyis/ /ngan pa'i mi rnams de dag ni/ /gtun la sogs pas brdungs pa na/ /sha rkang rus
pa phye mar 'gyur/ /de yi tshe na de dag la/ /shin tu grang ba'i rlung yang ldang / /des ni dmyal ba'i sems can rnams/ /sdug bsngal gyur pa de las 'tsho/ /mi rnams gang dag sdig
byed pa/ /gtun bu drag po rnams kyis 'joms/ /sta re rnams kyis gshegs pa dang / /de bzhin gsal shing 'dzugs par 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa'i/ /sems
can rnams kyi lus la ni/ /lcags mdung rtse mo bzhi pa dang / /rtse gsum pa dang rtse lnga 'bab/ /mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa/ /ral gri'i mchu can khwa rnams kyis/ /mgo yang
klad pa gtogs 'gyur zhing / /wa dang spyang kis zos par 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa/ /ngan skyugs rul ba dri nga zhing / /kun gyis smad par ltung 'gyur la/ /spu
gri'i chu klung rnams su ltung / /mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa/ /rab tu tsha bar bsreg 'gyur zhing / /ngu 'bod dang ni ngu 'bod che/ /thig nag tu yang bsreg par 'gyur/ /mi rnams
gang dag sdig byed pa/ /thig nag tu ni skyes nas kyang / /yang dang yang du me mur dang / /spu gri chu klung rnams su ltung / /gang tshe lcags kyi zangs po cher/ /mi rnams gang dag
'tshod pa na/ /khyi rnams kyis ni gtses gyur nas/ /de dag bde ba tshol bar byed/ /mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa/ /dmyal ba drag po chen por
ni| |lhung nas dpung gnyen yod min zhing / /lcags kyi thu lum za bar 'gyur/ /mi rnams sdig pa byed pa dag /lcags las grub pa'i brag chen dang / /mi sdug ri bo rnams
kyis ni/ /de tshe kun nas lus 'joms byed/ /nges ni rang gi las byas pas/ /'bras bu de 'dra thob gyur cing / /de yis tshor ba myong ba na/ /de la skyob pa 'ga' yang med/ /ji
snyed rten pa thams cad ni/ /bdag gi mdun der 'ga' yang med/ /der ni mgon med bdag gcig pu/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar byed/ /gang dag bde phyir don min par/
sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang / /pha ma de dag de ring ni/ /rnam par grol ba'i mthu yang med/ /gang dag bde phyir don min par/ /sngon chad nyes par spyad byas kyang / /bu dang
bu mo chung ma rnams/ /de ring bdag la 'grol mi nus/ /gang dag bde phyir ngon min par/ /sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang / /mdza' bshes nye du de dag kun/ /rnam par
'grel bar yong mi nus/ /gang dag bde phyir don min par/ /sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang / /bdag gi rtsa lag de dag kun/ /de ring 'grel bar mi nus so/ /'dod pa dman
pa rnams bsten cing / /dman pa'i chos rnams bsten nas ni/ /nyes pa'i las rnams byed pa dag /de yis ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ /shes rab 'chal ba mnar med par/ /song
nas sdug bsngal tshor ba myong / /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bud med dag /phyi sa'i dri ltar mnam par bsgrags/ /de phyir dman pa rnams dang ni/ /dman pa'i bud med rnams
bstan pa/ /byis pa de ni phyis yi/ /rkyal ba bzung nas gnas pa yin/ /ci 'dra'i las ni byed pa ltar/ /de 'dra'i 'bras bu 'thob 'gyur te/ /rgyal po yi ni chad pa dang / /sdug
bsngal bcing ba'ang myong bar 'gyur/ /bud med gzhi las skyes pa yang / /bsad dang bcing ba myong 'gyur zhing / /dmyal srung rnams kyis bsregs pa dang / /nges par 'chi
ba'ang myong bar 'gyur/ /bud med rnams la brkam pa yi/ /blo ngan de dag bde mi 'gyur/ /gsal shing mthon po rnams su ni/ /btsugs shing chur yang bcug par 'gyur/ /sa
yi ser khar bcug nas ni/ /de bzhin ral gris gdab par 'gyur/ /de 'dra ba dag thos nas ni/ /de dag yi chad bde mi 'gyur/ /rmongs pa bud med lhan cig tu/ /yang dang yang du
'du 'dzi byed/ /sdug bsngal 'dod pa rnams bsten cing / /dman pa rnams kyang smra bar byed/ /rmongs pa rnams kyis chos thos nas/ /dge bar gsungs zhes rjod byed kyang / /de sems
bud med phyi bzhin song / /byi ba la ni byi la bzhin/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa thos gyur nas/ /yud tsam zhig ni yid byung yang / /ha la ha la'i dug 'dra
ba'i/ /'dod chags kyis ni de yang 'khrug /ji ltar phag ni yud tsam zhig /dngangs shing skrag pa byung gyur kyang / /des ni phyi sa mthong ba na/ /chags pa bskyed par byed pa
ltar/ /de bzhin byis pa bde 'dod rnams/ /rgyal ba'i bstan pa spangs nas ni/ /'dod pa dman pa rnams bsten pas/ /des ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa rnams la
chags myos nas/ /shin tu sdig pa'i las byas shing / /tshul khrims can dag bslus byas nas/ /phyis ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ /shes rab can gyis dal rnyed cing / /de 'dra'i
chos ni thos gyur nas/ /'dod kun spangs nas 'di la ni/ /mkhas pa mngon byung rab byung zhig /rgyal po chen po/ /skyes pa 'dod pa la rten pa rnams kyi skyon ni de dag yin te/
'dod pa'i gzhi dang / 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa rnams ni/ sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ de lta bas na
khyod kyis rtag par rgyun du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/ /khyod kyi lus su gtogs pa'i sems rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bad
sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la de lta de ltar chos bstan par mdzad de/ chos bstan pa des bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba
dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skyes pa dang / bud med rnams kyi skyon bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar de dag bka'
stsal cing / legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi
ste| mtshon cha spangs shing / dbyug pa spangs la/ ngo tsha mchis shing / srog chags 'byung po thams cad la snying brtse bar zhugs pa lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag
dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag
dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog
brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ pad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus
pa nyi shu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs
pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya su ma ti dA ri ka pr-its+tshA nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du /
'phags pa bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong
khyer chen po na/ khyim bdag drag shul can gyi bu mo blo gros bzang mo zhes bya ba btsas nas lo brgyad lon pa 'dra ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes
pa| blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas ba mchog dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas 'bum
phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed ba zhig 'dug pa de 'khor dang bcas
par bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la
lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ gal te skabs phye bdag gis
ni| |rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog /'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa la/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang zhu/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| yid la ci 'dod thams cad ni/ /bu mo khyod kyis dri bar gyis/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun/ /ci 'dra khyod la bstan par bya/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das la/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gang gis su ni mdzes par 'gyur/ /gang gis nor ni che ba dang / /mi phyed 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur/
thub pas 'di ni bdag la gsungs/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar ni/ /gang gis brdzus te skye 'gyur zhing / /'dab ma stong ldan pad+ma la/ /mchis
par yang ni gda' ba dang / /zhing rnams bye ba dpag yas par/ /sangs rgyas phyag bgyir mchis pa yi/ /rdzu 'phrul pha rol phyin 'gyur ba'i/ /spyod pa rgyal bas lung bstan
gsol/ /dgra zla ma mchis gang gis 'gyur/ /tshig kyang btsun par 'gyur ba dang / /las kyi sgrib pa ma mchis dang / /bdud kyi las kun ma mchis dang / /'chi ba'i dus ni bgyid
pa na/ /mngon sum sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / /de las chos kyang nyan pa dang / /sdug bsngal tshor ba myong mi 'gyur/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bu
mo blo gros bzang mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bu mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so/ /legs so/ /bu mo de'i phyir legs
par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bu mo blo gros bzang mos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar
nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mdzes par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na /
'di lta ste/ tha na dgra la yang khro bar mi byed pa dang / byams pa la gnas pa dang / chos 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa ste/ bu mo/ byang chub
sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gnod pa'i rtsa ba khro ba 'phel mi byed/ /byams la gnas par byed dang chos 'dod
dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byas na ni/ /mdzes par 'gyur te lta bar 'os pa yin/ /bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na nor che bar 'gyur te/ bzhi
gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dus su sbyin pa dang / 'gyod pa med par sbyin pa dang / yid du 'ong ba sbyin pa dang / rnam par smin pa la mi re bar sbyin pa ste/ bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa'
chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na nor che bar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dus su sbyin dang 'gyod pa med pa dang / /yid 'ong sbyin dang rnam smin mi re ba/ /dpa' bo rnams ni
las 'di byas pas na/ /rtag tu longs spyod chen po thob pa yin/ /bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na 'khor mi phyed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
phra ma'i tshig spangs pa dang / sems can log par lta ba rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'jog par byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i tshe
dam pa'i chos srung ba dang / sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'jog par byed pa ste/ bu mo/ byang chub
sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na 'khor mi phyed par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ phra ma de bzhin log par lta ba spong / /dam chos 'jig pa'i tshe na srung
bar byed/ /sems can byang chub yang dag 'dzin 'jug na/ /'khor rnams mi phyed phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs
rgyas bcom ldan rnams kyi thad na/ rin po che chen po'i pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phye ma'am/ me tog ut+pa la'am/ pad+ma'am/ ku mu
da'am/ pad+ma dkar pos lag pa bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la 'bul ba dang / gzhan dag la yang gnod
sems mi bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa byed du 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la nges pa rgya cher mos pa ste/ bu mo/
byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad du rin po che chen po'i pad+ma la brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad
ces bya ste/ phye ma me tog bkang ste 'bul ba dang / /gnod sems spong zhing sku gzugs byed pa dang / /mos pa rgya chen la ni gnas byed na/ /rgyal ba dag gi thad du brdzus te skye/ /bu
mo| byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan dag gi
dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad mi byed pa dang / gzhan dag chos nyan pa la bar chad mi byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la mar me 'bul ba dang / /ting nge 'dzin
bsgom pa ste/ bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya
ste| dge ba dag gi bar chad mi byed dang / /gzhan gyi chos gtam dag la mi smod dang / /rgyal ba'i mchod rten rnams la mar me 'bul/ /ting 'dzin bsgom pas de ni zhing du
'gro/ /bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na /dgra zla med par 'gyur te bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ g.yo med par dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la bsten pa dang /
dge ba'i rtsa ba la ser sna mi byed pa dang / gzhan gyi rnyed pa la dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bya ba dang gnas pa thams cad la khong khro bar mi byed cing / mi snyan
pa mi sgrogs pa ste/ bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na dgra zla med par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la de g.yo med/ /gzhan gyi rnyed la dga' zhing ser sna med/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la mi smod na/ /rtag tu dgra zla med par spyod
par 'gyur/ /bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na tshig btsun par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / mdza' bo
dag la yod pa'i rang bzhin mi 'chab pa dang / klan ka mi tshol bar chos nyan pa dang / gzhan chos smra ba dag la 'phya skur mi byed pa ste/ bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' chos
bzhi po de dag dang ldan na tshig btsun par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / /mdza' la yod pa'i rang bzhin mi 'chab cing / /klan ka
mi tshol chos ni nyan byed na/ /'jigs pa med cing tshig kyang btsun par 'gyur/ /bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ las kyi sgrib pa med par 'gyur zhing
yongs su dag pa mang myur du rtogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pa sgrub pas sdom pa gsum yang dag par len pa dang / mdo sde zab mo
rnams mi spong ba dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'du shes bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa bsgom
pa ste/ bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ las kyi sgrib pa med par 'gyur zhing yongs su dag pa yang myur du rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces
bya ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas sdom pa gsum la gnas/ /mdo sde zab mo rnams la rtag tu mos/ /sangs rgyas sras la thams cad mkhyen ltar blta/ /sems can rnams la
byams pas las dag 'gyur/ bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud kyi las med par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid
du bsgom pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba ste/ bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de
dag dang ldan na bdud kyi las med par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos rnams la ni chos kyi tshul rtogs la/ /brtson 'grus brtsams shing sangs rgyas rjes su dran//
yongs su bsngo zhing bshags dang phyag 'tshal ba/ /de la bdud kyis glags ni rnyed mi 'gyur/ /bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mdun du
sangs rgyas bzhugs shing / de las chos kyang nyan la sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan dag gi
bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mos pa mang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa bkod pa sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub pa dang / dkon mchog gsum mchod pa
la brtson pa ste/ bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mdun du sangs rgyas bzhugs shing / de las chos kyang nyan la sdug
bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de ni gzhan gyi bsam pa rdzogs byed cing / /mos pa dag ni sbyin pa rgya che ba/ /mkhas pa de ni rtag tu sbyin par
byed/ /de'i phyir de mdun de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bu mo blo gros bzang mos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji skad bcas pa 'di dag la bdag gis bslab par 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bdag gis bslab
pa bzhi bcu po ji skad du bka' stsal pa 'di dag las chos gcig ma spyad na yang / bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bslus par gyur cig /de nas gnas brtan
mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bu mo blo gros bzang mo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni nyams 'og tu chud par dka' na/ khyod 'di lta bu
yang dag par len par byed na/ ci khyod kyis sems la dbang thob bam/ de skad ces smras nas/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras
so| |btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des gang gis bdag gis chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des
stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ lha'i me tog gi char 'bab par gyur cig /ma dkrol bar yang sil snyan gyi sgra 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas
so| |de nas bu mo blo gros bzang mos/ de ltar bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs byas ma thag tu/ de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/
lha'i me tog gi char bab par gyur cing / ma dkrol bar lha'i sil snyan gyi sgra yang byung bar gyur to/ /btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis/ de ltar de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bdag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur zhing / sangs
rgyas kyi zhing der bdag la bdud kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan song rnams kyi ming yang med pa dang / bud med kyi skyon rnams med par
'gyur ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des/ 'khor 'di gser gyi kha dog can du gyur cig /bu mo blo gros bzang mo'i tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mod la/ thams
cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de gser gyi kha dog can du gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po stan las langs te chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/
pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bu mo
blo gros bzang mo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /blo gros bzang mo khyod chos gang la gnas te/ bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di byas/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam
dpal/ chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa ma mchis pas/ de la gnas par mi nus te/ 'di la dri ba ma mchis so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo/ byang
chub ces bya ba 'di gang gi tshig bla dwags yin/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub ces bgyi ba ni/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /'jam
dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gang gi tshig bla dwags yin/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub
sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba ni/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi chos kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo ci/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang byang chub kyi
phyir spyad pa mdzad dam/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ dper na/ smig rgyu dang brag cas byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas kyang byang chub
kyi phyir spyad do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo khyod ci la bsams te 'di skad ces smras/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'di la chos 'ga' la yang
bsam pa'am/ bsam pa ma lags pa ma mchis so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo/ bsam pa de lta bu yin du zin na/ byis pa thams cad kyang byang chub tu
'gyur ro/ /blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ji snyam du dgongs/ byis pa rnams kyang gzhan la mkhas pa rnams kyang gzhan te/ byang chub kyang gzhan par de ltar
gzigs sam/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul du/ 'di ni dbyings gcig pa lags te/ blang ba ma mchis shing dor ba
ma mchis la/ sgro btags pa ma mchis so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo/ bshad pa 'di'i don shes pa ji snyed cig yod/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/
'jam dpal/ bshad pa 'di'i don 'tshal ba ni sgyu ma sprul pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba ji snyed mchis pa de snyed do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo
sprul pa nyid kyang med na de'i sems dang sems las byung ba lta ga la yod/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ chos kyi dbyings ni mchis pa yang ma lags/
ma mchis pa yang ma lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de dang 'dra'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar bu mo blo gros bzang mo 'di zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan pa ni/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal
de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ bu mo blo gros bzang mo/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas/ bskal pa sum cu lon pa'i 'og tu
gdod ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /khyod kyang bu mo blo gros bzang mo 'di nyid kyis mi skye ba'i chos la zhugs par byas so/ /de nas 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bu mo blo gros bzang mo la phyag byas nas/ tshig 'di skad du bdag gis slob dpon yun ring mo zhig nas mthong ngo zhes kyang smras so/ /blo
gros bzang mos smras/ 'jam dpal/ ma rtog cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci'i phyir slob
dpon gyis bud med kyi lus las da dung ma bsgyur/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ni bud med do/ /'di ni skyes pa'o zhes bya ba de ni dmigs pa ste/ 'on kyang khyod
kyi the tshom med par bya'o/ /bden pa gang gis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i bden pa des/
bdag skyes par gyur cig /bu mo blo gros bzang mos tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mod la/ de'i bud med kyi dngos po mi snang bar gyur nas skyes par gyur te/ chos gos
dur smrig gyon nas/ des 'di skad du bden pa gang gis/ bdag gis byang chub thob pa na/ dge slong tshur shog ces byas pas rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi
zhing der bdud kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan song gi ming yang med pa dang / bud med kyi skyon rnams kyang med par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang /
bden pa'i tshig des bdag dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo sum cu lon pa'i spyod lam ci 'dra ba de lta bur gyur cig /ces byas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang pos
tshig de skad smras ma thag tu de'i mod la/ de dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo sum cu lon pa'i spyod lam ci 'dra ba de lta bur gyur to/ /'jam dpal/ bden pa dang / bden
pa'i tshig gang dang gang gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ sems can rnams kyi lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur ba dang / bsams pas bza' ba dang / btung ba 'grub
par 'gyur te/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ngan song gsum yongs su
spang bar 'gyur ba dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa dang / rin po che'i dra bas yongs su bskor cing / rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma dag gis brgyan la/ steng rin po che'i bla re
bres te/ 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci 'dra ba kho na dang mnyam zhing mi lhag pa de lta bur 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des 'khor 'di gser gyi kha dog can du
gyur cig /ces byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang pos tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mod la/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de gser gyi kha dog can
du gyur to/ /de nas sa bla'i lha rnams kyi lha'i lus kyis gcig nas gcig tu sgra bsgrags shing skad kyis go bar byas te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros
bzang po byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /zhes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/
rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das yon tan rin chen dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ srog chags bye ba
phrag sum cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa nyid la yang dag par gnas par gyur to/ /lha bye ba phrag brgyad cu ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul
med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /srog chags brgyad stong gis ni ye shes mngon par rtogs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
pa'i dge slong byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog par 'dod pa lnga stong tsam yang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rtogs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba'i che ba
nyid mthong nas/ de dag rang rang gi bla gos bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol te/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos
nas tshig 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig /ces smras so/ /dge
slong de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos ma thag tu bskal pa dgu bcu'i 'khor ba bsnyil te bor nas/ bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gnas par gyur to/ /de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan te/ 'jam dpal/ dge slong 'di dag ni
bskal pa bcu gnyis na/ bskal pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa bzod par dka' ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du bskal pa
gcig la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba thams cad ming mthun
par 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la rdzu 'phrul
chen po byed pa yin no/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub 'dod pa gang gis bskal pa stong gi bar du thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug
la spyad la/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris nas/ zla ba phyed kyi bar du lan re bklags na/ bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas ni bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang
mi phod/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /'jam dpal/ de lta bas na chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di khyod la gtad kyi/ khyed 'dun par gyis la sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam las byung ba'i mdo 'di lta bu 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gzung zhig /kun chub par
gyis shig /chongs shig /shod cig /lhogs shig/ ston cig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /'jam dpal/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ji srid du gnas pa de
srid du/ rin po che sna bdun med par mi 'gyur la/ 'khor los/ sgyur ba'i rgyal po shin/ rin po che sna bdun med par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de
bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di 'jig rten na ji srid du spyod pa de srid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che sna bdun dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
chos kyi tshul thams cad med par mi 'gyur la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di med par gyur na/ dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bas na mdo sde rin
po che 'di lta bu 'di yi ger bri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams kyis brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o/ /'di ni nga'i rjes su bstan pa yin no/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re/ 'di ni rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub
'dod pa la ngas bstan pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
do| |'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa sum cu
pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sems bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya gang+go ta ra pa ri brits+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gang+gA'i mchog gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe grong khyer chen po mnyan yod na dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog ces bya ba zhig gnas so/ /de nas dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog mnyan yod nas byung nas/ rgyal
bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog la/ gang+gA'i mchog khyod da gzod gang nas 'ongs zhes smras so/ /gang+gA'i mchog
gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang zhig gis sprul pa la smras te khyod da gzod gang nas 'ongs zhes de skad bgyis na/ ji skad lan 'debs
par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog sprul pa la ni 'greng ba med/ 'dug pa med/ nyal ba med/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ 'chi 'pho
med/ skye ba med na/ 'di nas 'ongs so zhes de ci zhig ston par 'gyur/ gang+gA'i mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/
bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog /de bzhin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ gang+gA'i mchog khyod da gzod gang nas
'ongs zhes ci'i slad du smras/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog sprul pa ni ngan song du mi 'gro /mtho ris su mi 'gro /yongs su mya ngan las 'das par
mi 'gro na/ ci gang+gA'i mchog kyang ngan song du mi 'gro /mtho ris su mi 'gro /yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gro'am/ gang+gA'i mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das/ gal te bdag gis dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog sprul pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan lags par mthong na ni/ dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog /ngan song du 'gro ba'am/
mtho ris su mchi ba'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba ma lags so/ /zhes bdag sprul pa dang bstun du'ang mi rung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni
dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog sprul pa'i rang bzhin nas gzhan lags par ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis ma mthong na/ dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog
ngan song du mchi ba'am /mtho ris su mchi ba'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'chi ba zhes ji skad bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags kyis kyang / g.yo
ba dang / rlom sems dang / bskyod pa dang / spros pa mchis na/ ji ltar 'di snyam du bdag ngan song du 'gro ba'am/ mtho ris su 'gro ba'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par
'gro ba'o snyam du sems lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni/ nam yang ngan song du mchi ba'am/ mtho ris su mchi ba'am/ yongs su mya ngan
las 'das par 'gro ba'o snyam du sems lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni nam yang ngan song du mchi ba'am/ mtho ris su mchi ba'am/ yongs su
mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog kyang de lta bu'i dbyings can lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
gang+gA'i mchog khyod ci yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par ma zhugs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ su zhig gis mi skye ba la
smras te/ khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la ma zhugs sam zhes de skad bgyis na/ ji skad lan 'debs par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
gang+gA'i mchog /mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshig bla dwags yin na/ de ni ci zhig lan 'debs par 'gyur/ gang+gA'i mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
ci chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog/ de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs
so| |gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs pa lags na/ gang+gA'i mchog khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang
dag par ma zhugs sam zhes da ci zhig smra ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ su zhig gis sprul pa la smras te/ khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par ma zhugs
sam zhes de skad ces bgyis na/ ji skad lan 'debs par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog /dri ba 'di ni dmigs pa med pa'o/ /gsol
pa| ci bcom ldan 'das kyis dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i smra bas smras lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog /dri ba 'di ni dmigs pa med mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'khor
'di na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'dul ba dag yod de/ de dag gis don chen por 'gyur bas dris so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang+gA'i mchog /de bzhin gshegs pas ni
chos nyid ces bya ba yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas na/ gang de las byung ba'i chos yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa lta ga la zhig yod/ gsol pa/ gal
te bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyid ces bgyi ba yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/ de las byung ba'i chos lta ga la zhig mchis par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
chub kyi slad du ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog /gang dmigs pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma yin te/ byang chub
sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni gang gi tshe/ yang dag par sgrub pa de'i tshe yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid mi 'dor ro/ /gang gi tshe yang dag par mi sgrub pa de'i tshe yang bsam gyis mi
khyab pa nyid mi 'dor ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bgyi ba/ ci'i slad du bsam gyis mi khyab pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa
zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog /chos 'di ni sems pas thob par bya ba ma yin te/ sems pas thob par bya
bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di ni sems nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang sems las rab tu byung ba'i chos lta ga la yod/ gang+gA'i mchog /sems mi dmigs pa
ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud ces bya'o/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de ni thob pa ma yin/ mngon par rtogs pa ma yin/ shes pa ma yin/ mngon sum du byas
pa ma yin te/ de ni thob par bya ba ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang+gA'i mchog /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas
ni chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar nges par thugs su chud de/ gang+gA'i mchog /chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gnyen po med pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
gal te chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gnyen po ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs zhes btags pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes btags pa dang / phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / zag pa dang
bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes btags pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog /'di lta ste/ dper na/ bdag bdag ces 'dogs kyang bdag gang yang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du gang+gA'i mchog ngas/ gzugs zhes
btags te/ gzugs gang yang mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du ngas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes btags te/ rnam par shes pa gang yang
mi dmigs so/ /phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / kun nas
nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar yang ngas btags te/ mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gang+gA'i mchog
'di lta ste/ dper na/ smig rgyu rnams la ni chu yong med de/ mi dmigs so/ /gang+gA'i mchog /de bzhin du ngas gzugs zhes bya bar btags kyang / gzugs gang yang mi dmigs
so| |ngas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar btags kyang / rnam par shes pa gang yang mi dmigs so/ /phung po rnams dang / khams
rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar ngas btags kyang / don dam par na de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs so/ /gang+gA'i
mchog /gang chos la mchog tu 'dzin pa med par tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de lta bu ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa yin no//
gang+gA'i mchog /mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gnas la dmigs nas/ tshangs pa spyad pa spyod par de dag gi tshangs par spyod pa de ni yongs su ma dag pa'o/ /zhes nga smra'o/ /gang
dag tshangs par spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa de dag ni zab mo rgyud chad pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di thos na/ dngangs skrag par 'gyur te/ de dag skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang
'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su mi 'grol te/ de dag ni sdug bsngal gyi
bskal pa can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes nga smra'o/ /gang+gA'i mchog /da ltar ram/ nga 'das pa'i phyi na yang rung ste /gang dag zab mo rgyud chad pa 'di lta bu'i chos ston pa de dag la mi
gti mug pa dag gsod pa po'i 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur te/ de ltar mi gti mug pa de dag log par zin pas bsad pa'i zhe sdang bskyed nas/ ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /
gang+gA'i mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyud chad pa/ rgyud chad pa zhes bgyi ba/ ci'i slad du na rgyud chad pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i
mchog /chos 'di ni rgyud bcad pa'am/ dbye pa'am/ rnam par gzhig ga pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir rgyud chad pa zhes bya ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya/ bsam gyis mi
khyab pa'i rgyud ces bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas/ 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon
po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag
snang bar byas te/ 'od kyis khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung ste/ slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
kun dga' bos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum par mi mdzad na/ 'dzum par mdzad
pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ ngas mngon par shes te/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa stong
gis/ gang+gA'i mchog ces bya ba kho na'i dge bsnyen ma sha stag las brtsams te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do/ /dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad ni rab tu byung nas/ phung
po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i
ming ni dri ma med pa zhes bya ste/ 'di ni dri ma med pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/ dge slong bdun brgya dang / dge slong ma bzhi brgya len pa
med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i me tog rnams dang / tsan+dan gyi
phye ma rnams mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces/ 'di ltar grong khyer mnyan yod na/ dge bsnyen ma 'di lta bu gnas la/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dang
lhan cig smra yang / de'i lus ngal bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yang gang+gA'i mchog 'di sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / yun ring
po nas dge ba spyad pa dang / yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to/ /zhes smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag /de de bzhin te/ 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ yun ring po tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pa'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa
gang+gA'i mchog gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ji na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi
lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/
AR+Ya a sho ka dat+ta byA ka ra Na nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gcig
go /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya
rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs
pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa/ stong pa nyid la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/ smon pa med pa la
gnas pa/ mi dmigs pa'i chos la gnas pa/ mi gnas pa'i chos ston pa/ mi skye pa'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
lhun po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes lhun po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen seng ge dang / byang chub sems
dpa' seng ge blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag bsgreng dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson dang / byang chub
sems dpa' rtag tu 'dzum zhing rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang po las 'das pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu gdung dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin
chen sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen thogs dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkra ldan dang / byang chub
sems dpa' kha lo sgyur dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha lo sgyur chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bden pa la dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /
byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / skyes bu dam pa brgyad la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkon
mchog 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' phug sbas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang po'i lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' chu lha'i lha dang / byang chub sems
dpa' blo gros yangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros khyad par can dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'phel dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
brgyad stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na gnas shing bzhugs pa
la rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang / rgyal po'i bka' la gtogs pa dang / blon po dang / sna chen po la gtogs pa dang / zhang blon gyi bu tsha dang / zhabs drung na 'khod pa dang / pho
brang 'khor gyi mi dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ de nas bcom ldan
'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa 'di lta ste/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge
ba| don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba rab tu ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams pa'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang
ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa
ma 'gags pa dang / de dag dang / gzhan yang nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po rnams snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ chos gos dang / sham thabs bgos nas/ lhung bzed thogs te/
rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ /de nas nyan thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por mthar chags su bsod snyoms

kyi phyir rgyu zhing / mthar gyis rgyal po chen po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar 'khod do/ /yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang
na| bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa zhes bya ba btsas nas/ lo bcu gnyis lon pa 'dra ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po/ rgyas pa mchog dang
ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa
de rang gi pha'i khang bzang na khri gser gyi rkang pa can yod pa la 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas nyan thos chen po de dag mthong nas/ khri de las ma langs
te| bsur yang mi 'gro /phyag kyang mi byed/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan yang mi 'dings/ bsod snyoms kyang mi 'bul bar kha rog ste 'dug go /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ nyan
thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ong zhes thos nas/ rang gi khang bzang gi snga khang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag la mchog
tu sdug par 'dzin pas mngon par dga' zhing stan yang bting ngo / /rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas nyan thos chen po de dag mthong bzhin du kha rog ste
'dug pa mthong nas/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i nyan thos chen po ste/ che ba nyid kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su
thob pa| srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa/ snying brtse ba can yin te/ 'jig
rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu bar khyod kyis mi shes sam/ ci na khyod kyis de dag mthong la/ mthong bzhin du khri las kyang mi ldang / bsu bar yang mi byed/
phyag kyang mi 'tshal/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan dang bsod snyoms la yang spyan mi 'dren/ dad pa dang / gus pa yang mi bskyed par/ ci'i phyir ma gus pa ston cing kha rog ste 'dug /
khyod kyis don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong / de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas rang gi pha rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab/ 'di ji snyam du
dgongs/ ci| 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po/ rgyal phran la ldang ba'am/ bsur mchi ba nam yang gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo/ de ni ma yin no/ /bu mos
smras pa/ yab/ ci| lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha gzhan dag la ldang ngam/ bsur mchi'am/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no/ /bu mos smras pa/ yab/ ci| mi mjed kyi
bdag po tshangs pa lha gzhan dag la ldang ngam/ bsur mchi'am/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no/ /bu mos smras pa/ yab/ ci| rgya mtsho chen po mtsho dang / mtshe'u
dang / chu mig dang / mtsho bran dang / lteng ka dang / khron pa la phyag 'tshal ba gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo/ de ni ma yin no/ /bu mos smras pa/ yab/
ci| ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni ri nag po gzhan dag la 'dud pa'am/ phyag 'tshal ba gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo/ de ni ma yin no/ /bu mos smras pa/ yab/
ci| nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma'i tshogs srin bu me khyer gyi 'od 'dod pa gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no/ /bu mos smras pa/ yab/ ci| ri
dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge ni/ wa la ldang ba'am/ bsur mchis pa gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo/ de ni ma yin no/ /
bu mos smras pa/ yab/ de bzhin du su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags
pa la/ dman pa la mos pa nyan thos wa lta bur gyur pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang bral ba dag la dga' zhing ldang ba'am/ bsur mchi ba'am/ phyag 'tshal
ba'am/ bkur sti bgyid/ yab/ chos kyi rgyal po chen po su zhig chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor tam/ bskor bar bgyid pa na/ nyan thos dman pa/ zhan pa/ zhum
pa| nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la dga' bas phyag 'tshal ba'am/ 'dud par bgyid/ yab/ lha'i bdag po lha'i dbang po lta bu su zhig rnam par dag pa'i lha'i
bdag po don du gnyer ba na/ dge ba chung ba'i lha lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba'am/ ldang ba'am/ bsur mchi bar bgyid/ yang mi mjed kyi bdag
po tshangs pa lta bu su zhig 'jig rten na tshangs pa'i snga khang bla na med pa don du gnyer ba na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i tshangs pa lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa'am/ ldang
ba'am/ bsur mchi ba'am/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab/ su zhig ye shes rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos rtogs pa tshol ba na/ ba lang gi rmig
rjes kyi chu lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa'am/ ldang ba'am/ bsur mchi ba'am/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab/ su zhig ri rab lta bu'i
bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku don du gnyer ba na/ yungs 'bru lta bu ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang ldan pa'i nyan thos
dag la ldang ba'am/ bsur mchi ba'am/ phyag 'tshal ba'am/ 'dud pa'am/ 'dod pa skyed par byed/ yab/ su zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba nyid shes
rab dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes dang / yon tan nyi ma dang zla ba'i snang ba dpag tu med pa lta bu thos nas/ srin bu me khyer gyi 'od lta bu'i rang gi rgyud la snang ba gnas
pa/ gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dag gi rnam par grol ba la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang
nyan thos rnams la phyag mi 'tshal na/ bzhugs bzhin du lta ci smos/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ su zhig zla ba dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor btang ste/ srin bu me khyer la phyag 'tshal
bar bgyid/ yab/ gang nyan thos la brten pa ni nyan thos kyi sems dang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la
brten na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i rin po che'i sems bskyed pa dang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad
ces smras so/ /'di ltar khyod nyan thos 'di dag mthong bzhin du/ mi ldang zhing bsur mi 'gro la/ phyag mi 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur mi byed de/ 'di dag stan dang / bsod
snyoms la spyan mi 'dren pa ni/ bu mo khyod lhag pa'i nga rgyal can zhig go /de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ rang gi pha rgyal po ma skyes dgra
la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab/ bdag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yab khyod grong khyer kyi dbul po rnams la mi bzhen pa/ bsur
mi bzhud/ stan mi 'dings pa lags na/ khyod nyid lhag pa'i nga rgyal can lags pa snyam bgyid do/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo/ de dag ni nga yang mtshungs pa ma yin
ni| |bu mos smras pa/ yab/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang mtshungs pa ma lags so/ /
rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni nga rgyal dang / dregs pa spangs te/ sems can thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar mi byed dam/ bu
mos smras pa/ yab/ byang chub sems dpa' ni khon du 'dzin pa dang / tha ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / nyes pa spang ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin
par bgyi ba'i slad du sems can thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /yab/ nyan thos chen po 'di dag la ni khon du 'dzin pa dang / tha ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems
dang / nyes pa bsal bar bgyid ba ma mchis/ spang bar bgyi ba dang / dge ba 'phel bar bgyi ba yang ma mchis te/ yab/ nyan thos thams cad la ni sangs rgyas 'bum gyis/
nyan thos kyi tshul khrims ji snyed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa dang / shes rab ji snyed pas chos bstan du lags kyang / yab/ de dag la ni tshul khrims kyang ga las mchi/
ting nge 'dzin kyang ga las mchi/ shes rab kyang ga las mchi/ rnam par grol ba yang ga las mchi/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang ga las mchi/ yab/ 'di lta ste/
dper na/ bum pa chab kyis gang ba'i nang du char bab na/ de chab kyi thigs pa gcig kyang mi len la/ der gnas par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /yab/ de bzhin du nyan thos rnams la/
gal te sangs rgyas 'bum gyis chos bshad du lags kyang / de dag 'dzin par mi 'gyur la/ tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang /
rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang de dag la gnas par mi 'gyur zhing / rnam par 'phel bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /yab/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
rgya mtsho chen po ni chu klung thams cad dang / char gyi rgyun thams cad 'dzin cing der gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni tshad ma mchis pa'i slad
du'o/ /yab/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtsho lta bu de dag kyang de bzhin te/ chos bstan pa'i chu thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing / chos bstan pa
thams cad de la yang dag par gnas so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi
snod de ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ma skyes dgra yi bu mor gyur pa ni/ /mya ngan med byin yon tan gzi brjid brgyan/ /nyan
thos lnga brgya dag ni lhags gyur kyang / /de la phyag bya'i phyir ni de ma lang / /ma skyes dgra yis de la smras pa ni/ /bu mo don 'di nga las nyan par gyis/ /khyod kyi nyan thos lnga
brgya mthong bzhin du/ /phyag bya'i phyir ni ci phyir ldang mi byed/ /bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin na re/ /nyan thos 'di dag bdag gis mthong ba na/ /ci phyir phyag 'tshal bsam pa mi
skye ba/ /bdag mchis yab gcig tshig ni gsan par gsol/ /dper na mi zhig rgya mtshor mchis nas kyang / /rin chen 'byung khungs nas ni mching bu blangs/ /de bzhin bdag ni
nyan thos thams cad kyang / /ye shes dbyings nas nyan thos blangs snyam bgyid/ /dper na rgyal po nor gyi dbang du phyug po/ /sa bdag 'khor los bsgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas/ /kar
sha ba ni gcig tsam gsol na ni/ /de yis rgyal po bsten pa don ma mchis/ /gang gis 'khor los bsgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas/ /bye ba phrag stong gsol ba bgyis na ni/ /des ni
dbul mang nor dang ldan par bgyid/ /des ni rgyal po legs par bsten pa lags/ /kar sha pa ni slong ba'i mi bzhin du/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas rnams/ /
thos nas theg pa dman la 'dod skyed pa/ /nyan thos kun la bdag ni de snyam bgyid/ /nor rnams sgrub bgyid mi ni ji lta bu/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de 'dra ste/ /
rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po mnyes bgyis shing / /byang chub re gnas sems can 'dul bar bgyid/ /dper na nad pa nad brgyas gzir rnams sman pa yis/ /grol bgyid de bzhin
gzhan gyi sgra phyir 'brang ba yi/ /nyan thos nyon mongs rnams kyis gzir ba thams cad kyang / /byang chub sems dpa' sman pa lta bus grol bar bgyid
sems can mang po grol bgyid sman pa btang nas ni/ /sos gyur sems can la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid/ /de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman par gnyer ba na/ /sos
gyur nyan thos la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid/ /ji ltar nad pa sos par gyur ba thams cad la/ /sman pa dag gis gso bar nus par mi 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin nyan thos thams
cad sos par 'gyur ba la/ /sangs rgyas sman pa dag gis gso bar mi spyod do/ /'di ni sman pa gang zhig bdag gis bdag nyid la/ /gso bar sems kyi sems can
gzhan la ma lags te/ /de 'dra'i bdag nyid khengs par bgyid pa'i nga rgyal gyis/ /sman pa de dag la ni 'dod pa'i sems mi skyed/ /sman pa gang zhig snying rje bskyed
nas bdag nyid ji lta bar/ /de bzhin pha rol rnams kyang nad las grol bgyid pa/ /de ni mchod par 'os shing bsngags par bgyi ba dang / /'jig rten kun gyis 'dud
bar bgyi ba'i gnas kyang lags/ /gang gis ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas/ /bdag nyid grol bar bgyid kyi sems can gzhan ma lags/ /de ni sman pa bdag
nyid grol bar bgyid pa ltar/ /mkhas pa dag gis mchod pa bgyi ba'i gnas ma lags/ /gang gis ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas/ /sems can grangs med sdug
bsngal dag las grol bgyid pa/ /de dag byang chub mchog la 'dun ba skyed pa ste/ /de ni 'jig rten kun gyis bsngags par bgyi ba lags/ /e raN+Da yi shing sdong mdzes pa
ma lags la/ /de dag rnams kyi grib ma'ang yangs pa ma lags te/ /e raN+Da yi shing 'dra nyan thos thams cad kyi/ /rnam par grol ba'i grib ma nye bar bsten ma lags/ /
tsan+dan mchog gi sdong chen dag ni tsha ba yis/ /gdungs pa'i skye bo rnams kyi nye bar bsten pa lags/ /de bzhin bdag ni byung chub sems dpa' rnams la yang / /lha dang
bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag gis don bgyid snyam/ /ba lang rmig rjes chu ni yangs ma lags/ /tsha bas gdungs ba zhi bar mi bgyid la/ /gang+gA'i klung ni sems can bye ba stong / /
tshim par bgyis nas rgya mtsho chen por mchi/ /ba lang rmig rjes chu 'dra'i nyan thos kun/ /sems can kun gyi tsha bzhi mi bgyid/ /gang+gA'i klung 'dra'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
sems can mtha' yas chos kyis tshim par bgyid/ /ji ltar rin chen char ni 'bab pa ni/ /dbul po dag ni 'gron bu len par bgyid/ /gang zhig nor mang de dag blangs nas
ni/ /sems can dbul po nor dang ldan par bgyid/ /de ltar sangs rgyas rin chen chos char 'bebs/ /nyan thos rnams ni dam chos rin
chen las/ /chung du 'dzin te byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /sems can don slad mang du len par bgyid/ /ji ltar sems can dag ni ri rab kyi/ /drung du mchis na gser
gyi mdog tu 'gyur/ /ri bo gzhan la sems can rnams mchis na/ /gser gyi kha dog can du yong mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ri rab bzhin/ /gang
dag mthus ni lhar bcas skye dgu rnams/ /rnam grol mdog tu kha dog gcig tu 'gyur/ /nyan thos rnams kyi ye shes 'dod mi bgyid/ /yab gcig ji ltar rtswa bran
rtse mo yi/ /zil pa'i thigs pas lo tog rgyas mi bgyid/ /rab tu khebs pa'i sprin gyis sa steng 'di/ /tshim bar bgyid cing lo tog 'phel bar bgyid/ /nyan thos thams
cad zil ba'i thigs pa bzhin/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab 'bebs sprin dang 'dra/ /snying rje mngon byas gang dag bsten na ni/ /stong gsum dam chos chu yis tshim par
bgyid/ /ka ra bi ra'i me tog dri mchog mi na/ /des ni skyes par bud med dga' ma 'gyur/ /tsam ba ka yi me tog dri la dga'/ /ut+pal bar shi ka yang de bzhin no/ /nyan thos ka ra
pi ra'i dri bzhin te/ /de dag shes pas skye dgu dga' mi 'gyur/ /kun mkhyen dri can byang chub sems dpa' la/ /lha dang mi rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /gcig pu mchi ba de la
mtshar ci mchis/ /gang zhig sems can mtha' yas khrid pa rmad/ /nyan thos mi reng gcig pu mchi ba bzhin/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ded dpon 'dra/ /mgron zhig
gzhan gyis stsal pa 'tshal ba dang / /skye bo kun la stsol bgyid kun mgron bzhin/ /sgra 'brang nyan thos kun ni mgron dang 'dra/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun la mgron bgyid
bzhin/ /gzings las brten pas chu bo chen po las/ /gzhan dag bsgral bar nus par mi 'gyur gyi/ /brtan bgyis gru yi nang du zhugs nas ni/ /sems can bye ba mang po sgrol
